trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There was one other sighting in Sacramento on or around September 30th 2011
Summary: red and white blinking light appearing in different spots travelling north east
divs: Sighting DetailsI look in the sky after dark when i smoke a cigarette and always have binoculars. Light came from south east blinking white then red and each blink it was in a different spot 100-500 feet apart from the last blink, sometimes ending up 1000's of feet back in its origanal flight path. it would be in random spots each time it blinked, up down back and forward, continuing in a north east direction till it was gone. got that excited feeling in my chest. Seen same object at 6: 40 am but only white blinking on the same exact course.
